department.dept_long_name: Department of Germanic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Old Norse Language, Literature, and Culture: The Viking Legacy
course.description: Introduction to the language and literary culture of medieval Scandinavia, emphasizing works treating the Viking Age and their valorization of an heroic ideal. In addition to basic language skills, students acquire familiarity with key critical tools of the field. Readings include scaldic poetry, selections from Egils saga and the Vinland sagas, and various runic monuments.
course.notes: May be counted toward the Folklore and Mythology 90 requirement.
